name: lib
description: TypeScript library modules: core logic, AI integration, collaboration, utilities

ai-metadata-processor.ts.description: AI metadata processor for analyzing and enriching MetaMode data

ai-metadata-processor.test.ts.description: Tests for the AI metadata processor

auth.ts.description: Authentication service for user login and session management

collaboration.ts.description: Real-time collaboration logic using WebSocket connections

command-macros.ts.description: Macro system for recording and replaying command sequences

command-macros.test.ts.description: Tests for the command macros module

command-plugins.ts.description: Plugin system for extending the command registry

command-plugins.test.ts.description: Tests for the command plugins module

command-registry.ts.description: Registry for application commands with keyboard shortcuts

community-gallery.ts.description: API client for community gallery features

community-gallery.test.ts.description: Tests for the community gallery module

conversation-agent.ts.description: AI conversation agent for natural language cube design

devmode.ts.description: Developer mode utilities for debugging and MetaMode queries

devmode.test.ts.description: Tests for the developer mode module

energy-visualization-defaults.ts.description: Default configuration values for energy visualization effects

energyPhysics.ts.description: Physics engine for energy-based cube animations

energyPhysics.test.ts.description: Tests for the energy physics engine

extended-search.ts.description: Extended search functionality with filters and sorting

extended-search.test.ts.description: Tests for the extended search module

fft-presets.ts.description: Predefined FFT parameter presets for audio visualization

fft-wasm.ts.description: WebAssembly FFT integration for high-performance frequency analysis

fft-wasm.test.ts.description: Tests for the FFT WebAssembly integration

github-api.ts.description: GitHub API client for issue creation and repository interaction

github-api.test.ts.description: Tests for the GitHub API client

god-mode-library.test.ts.description: Tests for the God Mode library integration

issue-generator.ts.description: Automated GitHub issue generator from application context

lod-system.ts.description: Level of Detail (LOD) system for optimizing 3D rendering

metamode-preprocessor.test.ts.description: Tests for the MetaMode preprocessor validation logic

performance.test.ts.description: Tests for the performance monitoring module

publishing-api.ts.description: API client for publishing cube designs to the community

publishing-api.test.ts.description: Tests for the publishing API client

screen-capture.ts.description: Screen capture utility for exporting cube renders as images

screen-capture.test.ts.description: Tests for the screen capture utility

shader-utils.ts.description: GLSL shader utility functions for cube rendering

share-links.ts.description: Share link generation and parsing for cube designs

share-links.test.ts.description: Tests for the share links module

social.ts.description: Social features: likes, comments, and user interactions

social.test.ts.description: Tests for the social features module

stack-presets.test.ts.description: Tests for the stack presets module

storage.ts.description: Local storage service for persisting cube designs and settings

tinyLLM.ts.description: Lightweight LLM client for AI-powered features

validation.ts.description: Input validation utilities for cube parameters

webgpu-compute.ts.description: WebGPU compute shader integration for parallel processing

webgpu-compute.test.ts.description: Tests for the WebGPU compute module

websocket-client.ts.description: WebSocket client for real-time collaboration connections

window-layout-manager.ts.description: Window layout manager for positioning and arranging windows

window-layout-manager.test.ts.description: Tests for the window layout manager

window-performance.ts.description: Performance optimizations for the window management system

window-performance.test.ts.description: Tests for the window performance module
